root.name: background()
root.description: The background() function sets the color used for the background of the Processing window. The default background is light gray. In the draw() function, the background color is used to refresh the display window between frames. If an image is specified, the image will be drawn centered in the display area.
root.syntax: background(gray) background(color) background(value1, value2, value3) background(img)

parameter.label: gray
parameter.description: int: specifies a value between white and black

parameter.label: color
parameter.description: color: any value of the color datatype

parameter.label: value1
parameter.description: int: red or hue value (depending on the current color mode)

parameter.label: value2
parameter.description: int: green or saturation value (depending on the current color mode)

parameter.label: value3
parameter.description: int: blue or brightness value (depending on the current color mode)

parameter.label: img
parameter.description: PImage: image to draw for the background
